ComicInfo.Title: A House Divided
ComicInfo.Summary: A House Divided: Raader and friends are reunited with her old ship and crew. Back through the Cloudwall, they head for Haven, the pirate planet. Black Bess and her pirate crew are waiting to ambush her. And the Colonizer fleet is waiting to destroy them all.
